  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/637</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/637</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'origen dels Jocs Olímpics</string>
            <string language="en">The origin of the Olympic Games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Ursprung der olympischen Spiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'origine des jeux olympiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A origem dos jogos olympic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'origine dei giochi olimpici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προέλευση των ολυμπιακών αγώνων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre el desenvolupament històric dels Jocs Olímpics (de l'era clàssica i de l'època moderna). Conté una fotografia de lestadi d'Olímpia i tres enllaços per ampliar informació diversa sobre els Jocs (clàssics, moderns i de 2004)</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the history of the Olympic Games (from classical times to the present day). It includes a photograph of the stadium at Olympia and three links for further information on the Games (classic, modern and 2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">civilització clàssica</string>
            <string language="en">classical civilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història grega</string>
            <string language="en">Greek history</string>
            <string language="es">historia griega</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mitologia</string>
            <string language="en">mythology</string>
            <string language="es">mitología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der
Geschichte der olympischen Spiele (von den klassischen Zeiten zum 
anwesenden Tag). Er enthält eine Fotographie des Stadium bei 
Olympia und drei Links für weitere Informationen über die Spiele 
(klassisch, modern und 2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur l'histoire des
jeux olympiques (des périodes classiques aujourd'hui). Elle 
inclut une photographie du stade chez Olympia et de trois liens pour 
de plus amples informations sur les jeux (classique, moderne et 2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) no history dos jogos 
olympic (das épocas classical ao dia atual). Inclui uma 
fotografia do stadium em Olympia e de três ligações para uma 
informação mais adicional nos jogos (clássico, moderno e 2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla storia dei 
giochi olimpici (dai periodi classici oggi). Include una 
fotografia dello stadio a Olympia e di tre collegamenti per ulteriori 
informazioni sui giochi (classico, moderno e 2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στην ιστορία των ολυμπιακών 
αγώνων (από τους κλασσικούς χρόνους σήμερα). Περιλαμβάνει 
μια φωτογραφία σταδίου στην Ολυμπία και τριών συνδέσεων για 
περισσότερες πληροφορίες στα παιχνίδια (κλασικός, σύγχρονος και 
2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">klassische Zivilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">civilisation classique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire grecque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">civilização classical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mythology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">civilizzazione classica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia greca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mitologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλασσικός πολιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνική ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μυθολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
